author: ETA PRIME
description:
This OLED Ultra Wide Gaming Monitor is a real Game changer! In this video we test out the new INNOCN 49Q1S an OLED Ultra wide gaming monitor with all the bells and whistles like a 240Hz refresh rate, USB type C video in with 90W Charging, 22W Speakers built in PIP for dual screens or phone and more! With a resolution of 5120 x 1440p and a 0.03ms response time this monitor is crazy but it does take some getting use to coming over from a standard aspect ratio. We test the Steam deck with this Ultra wide monitor, the Galaxy S25 Ultra with DEX a Mini PC  and my gaming laptop!

Buy the INNOCN 49" 49Q1S OLED On Amazon: https://amzn.to/3YoT9UG

More INNOCN Monitors: https://amzn.to/4lnOH2D
